subject: Globe Business - New device login detected
body:
Good day,

We detected a sign-in to your Globe Business account from a new device.

Sign-in details:
- Device: Samsung Galaxy S23 (Android 14)
- Location: Makati City, Metro Manila
- Date and time: March 17, 2024, 9:15 AM PHT
- App: Globe One Business App

If this was you, no action is needed. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.

Review recent activity: https://business.globe.com.ph/security

Best regards,
Globe Business Security Team

safety_factors: Links to official Globe Business portal
No urgent threats or pressure tactics
ai_analysis.educational_focus: Legitimate security notification from a major Philippine telecommunications provider - uses official domain, specific local details, and professional tone.
verification_tips: Verify the sign-in actually occurred in your Globe Business account
Check if you recognize the device and Makati location
Official Globe emails always use globe.com.ph domain
Look for specific technical details rather than vague warnings

subject: PLDT Enterprise - Fiber connection maintenance notice
body:
Good day,

This is to inform you of scheduled maintenance on your PLDT Enterprise Fiber connection.

Maintenance Details:
- Account: PLDT-ENT-789456
- Service Address: 123 Ayala Avenue, Makati City
- Date: March 26, 2024
- Time: 2:00 AM - 5:00 AM PHT
- Duration: Up to 3 hours
- Affected Service: Internet connectivity
- Speed: 500 Mbps Fiber

This maintenance is necessary to upgrade network equipment and improve service quality.

For urgent concerns, contact PLDT Enterprise Hotline: (02) 8888-0-101
Check status: https://business.pldthome.com/service-status

We apologize for any inconvenience.
PLDT Enterprise Support Team

- Company: CYBERQUEST TECHNOLOGIES INC.
- SEC Registration: CS202012345
- Fiscal Year End: December 31, 2023
- Filing Deadline: April 15, 2024
